message: I have a unique and valuable product that I think you'll love. I'm open to negotiations, but I have to start somewhere. Would you be interested in purchasing it for $14000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a living. I can do $13000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11500. Can we discuss further?
I'm glad we're getting closer, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $12500, and that's as close to your offer as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I'm not sure I can go as high as $12500, but I'm willing to meet you at $12000. Can you consider that?
